law.catch_line: Cancellation Of Registration Of Foreign Limited Liability Company

text.section: the name of such foreign limited liability company and, if different, the name under which it is registered and doing business in the commonwealth;
the address of the principal office of such foreign limited liability company;
the address of the principal office in the commonwealth of such foreign limited liability company, if any, and the name and business address of its resident agent in the commonwealth;
that such foreign limited liability company is not doing business in the commonwealth; and
that all taxes and fees owed the commonwealth have been paid or provided for.
